info.title: Abivin vApp APIs
info.description: All APIs described with apidoc tags in code

location.description: {   number  latitude   number  longtitude   number  speed   number  offset   boolean locationDisabled }

createdBy.description: ID of user who created this organization

_id.description: ID in database of the organization

orderBy.description: JSON string of how to sort the returned list

roleIds.description: ID of updated roleGroup for this user

organizationIds.description: ID of updated organizations for this user

file.description: File that contains list of imported users

userId.description: Id of user to get data

username.description: Username of user to send email to

firstName.description: First name of the account holder

lastName.description: Last name of the account holder
